Posts.Content: Donating to the National Breast Cancer Foundation means a lot to me since I have several family and friends who have had breast cancer. These candle warmers are on sale at my website right now and 100% of the profits go toward the National Breast Cancer Foundation to support funding for breast cancer awareness and educational programs. Please check out this beautiful candle warmer at my website: LINK DELETED PER FORUM POSTING POLICIES. PLEASE READ AND COMPLY. THANK YOU.
Posts.Title: Scentsy Breast Cancer Warmer--beautiful!
